data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Lake Ohrid to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lake Ohrid, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 70 believers in Lake Ohrid to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 42,030 lost friends and neighbors.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 601 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Lake Ohrid, North Macedonia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Lake Ohrid.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Lake Ohrid, North Macedonia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Lake Ohrid.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Lake Ohrid to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
